snippet: South Korea's nuclear power operator said on Sunday that cyberattacks on non-critical operations at the company's headquarters are continuing but the country's nuclear power plants are operating safely and are secure from attack....

headline.print_headline: South Korea Nuclear Operator Says Cyberattacks Continue, Reactors Safe
headline.main: South Korea Nuclear Operator Says Cyberattacks Continue, Reactors Safe

lead_paragraph: South Korea's nuclear power operator said on Sunday that cyberattacks on non-critical operations at the company's headquarters are continuing but the country's nuclear power plants are operating safely and are secure from attack.
